description: The trail is well tracked. Great views north to Mable Lake west to Silverstar and southerly to Vernon .
directions: Heading east  leaving Lumby BC turn onto Creighton Valley Road till you get to the turn off to Clier Lake heading northward on an old logging road, do not go passed Barbe Lake heading east otherwise you have gone to far. Once at Clier Lake turn westward to get to the trail head .The Access is strictly 4x4 after Clier Lake.
title: Camel's Hump
